name: [Demo|Prototype] Evergreen
description:
This is a submission for the My First Game Jam: Winter 2022. The theme is nature.

Keep in mind that this is just a prototype of the game idea. It contains only basic mechanics. We're going to continue on it when we have a time.

Controls:

Movement: w, a, s, d

Camera: mouse

Interaction: F

The game is about the Explorer who walks through a polluted forest, littered with human artifacts. They want to destroy the whole forest. Even the Tree of Nature. Will you save it? Walk around and destroy artifacts to reclaim the forest. 

Team:

Narrative Designer: pixel-shark

Programming: brycon, quaky

Level Designer: brycon

3D Modeller: hibi

Music Supervisor and Composer: mrdarcy

3rd party assets:

  • https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environments/landscapes/low-poly-simple...
  • https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environments/landscapes/free-low-poly-n...
  • https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/vegetation/trees/low-poly-tree-pack-578...
  • https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/tools/particles-effects/lowpoly-water-1075...
  • https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environments/low-poly-pack-94605
  • https://freesound.org/people/JayHu/sounds/506103/

We wish you a lot of fun.
